arts.ttl: Wagner admits Augsburg were "punished ruthlessly" by RB Leipzig in 0-6 routing
arts.sum: Sandro Wagner believes Saturday’s 0-6 defeat to RB Leipzig was “a real slap in the face” for Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs RB Leipzig - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and RB Leipzig, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
